column3: You cannot purchase private chambers until you have attained level 50 in a single class.
Moreover, you must also have attained the rank of second lieutenant in the Maelstrom, the Order of the Twin Adder, or the Immortal Flames.

Do you wish to purchase your own private chambers for <Format(IntegerParameter(1),FF022C)/> gil?
The purchase price will not be refunded under any circumstances.

Do you wish to purchase a company workshop for <Format(IntegerParameter(1),FF022C)/> gil?
The purchase price will not be refunded under any circumstances.
